data.prayer: Lord, let it be said of the 1,098,680 lost in Bundi that you have called them out of darkness into your glorious light.
data.verse: But you are a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for God’s own possession, that you may proclaim the excellence of him who called you out of darkness into his marvelous light

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Bundi, Rajasthan, India
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Spirit, renew the call of John the Baptist in the county of Bundi. Send out bold servants who will call all to repent.
data.verse: Repent, for the kingdom of heaven is at hand.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 90 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, thank you that you will never abandon the church of Bundi, Rajasthan, India.
data.verse: Be free from the love of money, content with such things as you have, for he has said, “I will in no way leave you, neither will I in any way forsake you.

data.prayer: Lord, cause a passion for prayer among the people of Bundi, Rajasthan, India.
data.verse: I [Jesus] pray also for those who will believe in me through their message, that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.prayer: Lord, bring the blind by a way that they don’t know. Lead the Faqir people in paths that they don’t know. Make darkness light before them and crooked places straight. Do not forsake the Faqir people.
Spirit, help the 12,220 believers find a person of peace today among the 1,098,680 lost neighbors around them. And help them start discovery bible studies in these unbelieving homes.
data.verse: Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor. Send to Joppa for Simon who is called Peter. He is a guest in the home of Simon the tanner, who lives by the sea.’ So I sent for you immediately, and it was good of you to come. Now we are all here in the presence of God to listen to everything the Lord has commanded you to tell us.”

data.prayer: Spirit, instill a desire within the people of the county of Bundi to hide your Word in their heart.
data.verse: I have hidden your Word in my heart that I might not sin against you.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the church in the county of Bundi do things that will multiply their numbers, not just add to them.
data.verse: But thanks be to God, who always leads us triumphantly as captives in Christ and through us spreads everywhere the fragrance of the knowledge of Him.
